releaseNotes:
We've made some enhancements to take your app experience to the next level...
General Fixes: We've squashed some more bugs to improve your app's performance.
Upgrade now to get the most out of your app experience.
description:
CONFIRMED is not just adidas' ultimate sneaker source and one of the world's top sneaker apps. It’s a community of originals, where everything is curated for you.

Shop a handpicked selection of adidas products from rare and collector sneaker and apparel releases to accessories and more. Read the latest sneaker news and original style and streetwear content from adidas. Unlock exclusive benefits, events and experiences, unique to your country.

A COMMUNITY OF ORIGINALS
The CONFIRMED app is more than a shopping platform. It's a portal to connect with the communities of adidas, CONFIRMED, sneakers, streetwear and style.

LIMITED-EDITION SNEAKERS
Set reminders for upcoming release dates and get access to exclusive sneaker drops and partnered releases. These include the likes of BAPE, Bad Bunny, Fear of God, GUCCI, Moncler, Pharrell Williams’ Humanrace, Yeezy, Y-3 and more.

OTHER EXCLUSIVE PRODUCTS
Shop curated, seasonal edits and luxury collections featuring caps, bags, hoodies, t-shirts and more. Get access to buy sneakers and apparel from the latest adidas Originals ranges. Plug into new, virtual worlds and claim digital products and prizes from NFTs to gear for the metaverse.

CURATED STYLE CONTENT
Read exclusive interviews with designers, collectors, and modern style and streetwear icons. Follow us on deep-dives through the adidas Archive. Explore the heritage and creative vision behind upcoming sneakers, apparel, and moments in the adidas, sneaker and fashion communities.

MEMBERSHIP REWARDS
Earn adiClub points for purchases and engagement. Elevate your experience by spending points to unlock special offers and events. Level up to enhance your chances of winning access to sneaker drops, exclusive member events, and more. Membership rewards are only available in selected regions and vary per country.

COMMUNITY EXPERIENCES
Get invited to both in-app and real-life experiences tailored to your interests and location: secret underground music gigs, A-list fashion launches, art shows, location-triggered surprise moments, behind-the-scenes previews of what's coming to CONFIRMED and more. Some experiences are adiClub-exclusive.

NOT JUST FOR SNEAKERHEADS 
Our app is highly regarded by fashion enthusiasts seeking cool and original shoe designs. But it’s also equally esteemed for its apparel and accessories, unique style stories, and community of creative followers and fans.

IN-DEPTH ADIDAS NEWS
Enjoy exclusive content and elevated storytelling from top-rated tastemakers. Discover the stories behind the shoe designs from the iconic “brand with the 3 stripes”. 

ACCESS TEAM ADIDAS
Meet the minds behind your favourite adidas designs. Engage with the adiClub community about music, fashion, art, and streetwear. Explore and help shape the future of CONFIRMED with the very team that brings it to life.

FAIR FOR EVERYONE 
Shop for men's sneakers, women's sneakers, and unisex sneakers – we cater to every original style taste. With running shoes, retro shoes, sports shoes, the latest lifestyle sneakers, hybrid designs and more...we've got you covered.

FOR KIDS TOO 
Children love to express themselves in their style too. That’s why our greatest sneaker designs and collaborations are available in grade-school sizes. Get your kids shoes to match your most beloved pairs or something that's just theirs.

PERSONALIZE YOUR PROFILE
The app's user-friendly registration process allows you to easily set your profile and preferences so you can get your kicks your way. Receive notifications and alerts for content that interests you most from a selection of our men’s, women’s, unisex and kids’ product ranges.

BECOME PART OF THE STORY
Discover the creative design vision behind the latest drops and stories from the Originals community. Play outside the lines of conventional streetwear and athleisure. Explore a catalogue of diverse products spanning Campus, Superstar, Stan Smiths, Samba, Spezial, Ultraboost, ZX trainers and more.
